Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
Types of Grants
7
Grants can come from:
o UPM:
• Agreements
• PIF Grants
• Consejo Social (of UPM)
• Erasmus+
o Host:
• Country
• Institution
o Others:
• Projects
• Actions (Marie Curie, etc)
